name: Lost Bunnies
description:
Momma rabbit has lost her babies in a cave full of dangers: big rocks and mischievous moles appear everywhere.

Rescue and getting them out before dinnertime will be no easy task; fortunately you have your wits and the strength of carrots to push rocks.

Controls:

  • Move with Direction Arrows
  • Push rocks (if you eat one carrot before) with Spacebar

Lost Bunnies is a short videogame developed for the Malaga Game Jam January 2021

Tools And Technologies: 

Krilloud

Unity
